reviews.review_msg: Really nice prof, definitely improved, even though he was already great! He's less monotone (he was "too zen" his calm voice can put you to sleep) and his classes are even more enjoyable than before. He's showing his sense of humour more and more making the lectures more interesting. There's TOO many assignments he should lose a quiz and paper.

very relaxed prof. very knowledgeble abt hinduism.the text bk is ur bible. for presentation make sure u do ur reasarch apart 4m wats in the text bk. do not expect good marks if u just say things tat r in the assigned text bk for the term. otherwise he is very easy.
